original_title: Leslie Sansone: Walk Away The Pounds: 7 Day Calorie Blast
overview: Start losing weight and trimming fat with Leslie Sansone s Walk Away the Pounds 7-Day Calorie Blast! Choose from 7 different workouts, all on one exciting DVD!  DVD INCLUDES OVER 200 MINUTES OF WORKOUTS: 1 Mile Get Started  2 Mile Fitness Walk  Walk Away Your Stress  Heart Healthy Walk  Upper Body Fitness  Lower Body Fitness  The Evening Mile
title: Leslie Sansone: Walk Away The Pounds: 7 Day Calorie Blast
